channel.title: TeamTorva
channel.description: Hey guys i recently downloaded the teamtorva cache and client, so far so good except a couple of things. i don't know how to change the client screen (where it says "welcome to the official teamtorva client"). and also in the client.java file i typed server= (to find the server ip and replace with my hamachi ip address) an nothing came up. if you can give me a solution to both of these problems that would be awesome. thanks for reading! help is appreciated.

item.title: TeamTorva
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

Lol you have to make the ip adress 127.0.0.1 in gui.java for some reason i have to do it or people can’t connect.

Read full topic

item.title: TeamTorva
item.dc:creator: @thock321 thock321
item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

compile after changing, then give your players the changed version. Don’t give them the .java files or they will mess around with the client

Read full topic

item.title: TeamTorva
item.dc:creator: @bobbuilder bobbuilder
item.description:
@bobbuilder wrote:

sorry bunnie. im new to all this mate haha. i made an ip adress at no-ip. the ip is scionpkz.no-ip.com. i changed that with the ip in the gui. how would players connect to my server?

Read full topic

item.title: TeamTorva
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

go search “server =” in client.java, and also change the ip in gui.java…tell me if this works…

Read full topic

item.title: TeamTorva
item.dc:creator: @bobbuilder bobbuilder
item.description:
@bobbuilder wrote:

server =. nothing came up only the 2 main folders wich don’t have it in it i suspect. and by the main client i meant the game screen. the outline of the game on the top wich says “official” . etc… no idea how to change it to my own server name :S

Read full topic

item.title: TeamTorva
item.dc:creator: @thock321 thock321
item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

search “server =” without the quotes. u have to have a space between server and the equals sign. and by client screen what do you mean?

Read full topic

item.title: TeamTorva
item.dc:creator: @bobbuilder bobbuilder
item.description:
@bobbuilder wrote:

Hey guys i recently downloaded the teamtorva cache and client, so far so good except a couple of things. i don’t know how to change the client screen (where it says “welcome to the official teamtorva client”). and also in the client.java file i typed server= (to find the server ip and replace with my hamachi ip address) an nothing came up. if you can give me a solution to both of these problems that would be awesome. thanks for reading! help is appreciated.

Read full topic
